task.title: Managing Framework Settings
task.abstract: System Admins can enable or disable platform settings and triggers, as well as create a custom domain name for Visualforce pages. Disabling the default platform settings deactivates all related Registered Objects on the platform, as well as the associated triggers. Consequently, data is entered into the system without triggering automatic workflows and notifications to users.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Spark Framework app, click Apps, and click Spark from the dropdown menu.
Enter a new Custom Domain name for Visualforce pages.
Check the Is Enabled checkbox to enable the Framework.
step.info: If not selected, the application and any registered objects to the Framework will be disabled. Enabled by default.

step.cmd: Check the Triggers Enabled checkbox to enable all triggers for the Framework.
step.info: If not selected, all triggers are disabled. Enabled by default.

step.cmd: Check the Enable Async Rollups checkbox to enable async rollups in the system. Enabled by default.
